email.description: Your email address is your login

verificationRequested.title: Verify account
verificationRequested.message: Link to verify your account has been sent to {{email}}. Check this email. If the message doesn’t appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.

email.description: Link to reset password will be sent to this e-mail

success.title: Link sent
success.message: Link do reset password has been sent to {{email}}. Check your email. If the message doesn’t appear within a few minutes, check your spam folder.

success.title: Password change successful
success.message: You have been signed in with the new password

verificationRequired.title: Email verification required
verificationRequired.message: In order to fully activate your account please open the activation link that was sent to {{email}}.

message.signedIn: Email address {{email}} has been successfully verified. You can now get the most out of the app.
message.signedOut: Email address {{email}} has been successfully verified. You can now get the most out of the app after you sign in.

error.emailAlreadyInUse: The email address is already in use by another account.
error.invalidEmail: The email address is not valid.
error.weakPassword: The password is not strong enough.
error.userDisabled: The user corresponding to the given email has been disabled.
error.userNotFound: There is no user corresponding to the given email.
error.wrongPassword: The password is invalid for the given email.
error.expiredActionCode: The time to reset password with this link has expired.
error.invalidActionCode: It looks like you clicked on an invalid link. Please try again or contact the system administrator.
error.default: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later or contact the system administrator.
